title: "Austrian facial recognition database collects over 600,000 entries in a year"
excerpt: "A database set up by a 2020 law that allows for the use of facial recognition software to identify potential criminals has already collected 638,693 entries, a parliamentary inquiry by the liberal NEOS unveiled on Monday has found."
